Plot: A loser of a crook and his wife strike it rich when a botched bank job's cover business becomes a spectacular success.
Title: Small Time Crooks
Actors: Woody Allen, Carolyn Saxon, Tracey Ullman, Michael Rapaport
tomatoConsensus: Woody Allen rises from his recent slump with Small Time Crooks. A simple, funny movie, Crooks proves Allen still has the touch that made his name synonymous with off-beat comedy.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 1 win & 3 nominations.
